DOC.brief_summary: People spinal cord injury ( SCI ) characteristically low level high-density lipoprotein-cholesterol ( HDL-c ; `` good cholesterol '' ) high level low-density lipoprotein-cholesterol ( LDL-c ; `` bad cholesterol '' ) , high risk develop cardiovascular health problem , heart disease , heart attack stroke , able-bodied population . A common way able-bodied people improve lipid profile exercise ; however , SCI people , especially tetraplegics , often unable achieve maintain level exercise need obtain benefit . It therefore clinically important find effective , safe inexpensive method increase HDL-c level people chronic tetraplegia . This study investigate effect omega-3 fatty acid supplementation lipid profile people tetraplegia . The investigator hypothesize 5 month daily consumption high dose omega-3 fatty acid increase plasma level HDL-c tetraplegia , lead decrease risk cardiovascular health issue .
DOC.brief_title: Omega-3 Supplementation Tetraplegics With Poor Cholesterol Levels
DOC.criteria: Having chronic tetraplegia ( least year since injury ) 18 year old Having normal fast blood plasma level HDLc ( < 1 mmol/l ) Currently take omega3 supplement Currently take medication abnormal cholesterol Having heart attack stroke past one year
